## TokenManager.getToken() method

Retrieve a new token using `requestToken()` in the case there is not a currently stored token from a previous call, or the previous token has expired.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getToken(): Promise<any>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;
